body.name: Indoor Dust Broom with Long Handle - Angle Broom for Hardwood Floor Cleaning Inside Soft Sweeping Brooms for House and Kitchen
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 34 mins
features: Best for Hardwood Floor: The brooms head with thick and soft bristle that is great for cleaning dust, hair and pet hair. Especially, the indoor broom is best suit for hardwood and wood floor cleaning.
Angle Broom: The Sweeper with 13.8 width has double soft bristles that is great to catch dirt, dust and hair. The angled head design is good for reaching into the corner and cabinets.

54" Long Handled Broom: Built in 3 stainless steel poles, the dust broom height is adjustable. Brooms can be adjusted from 38" to 54". It is long enough to avoid to bend down, which makes cleaning house more easier.
Widely Used: The indoor/inside broom is great for cleaning home/house like kitchen, lobby, bedroom and balcony.The soft sweeping brush is ideal for tile and hardwood cleaning floor.
24/7 Customer Service: Package includes a broom head and 3 poles. Just contact us at the first time if you have any quality problem after purchasing, we are happy to help you solve.
body.description: Specification Material: Stainless Steel and Plastic Size: 13.8" in width Height: 38 inches - 54 inches Color: Blue Features The indoor dust broom with soft bristle that great for hardwood floor cleaning. Long handled design allows you use the broom more easily. Adjustable length from 38 - 54 inches, choose the most suitable height that you need. Suitable various materials floors like tile floor, marble floor, cement floor and hardwood floor. Package Included 1 x Broom Head 3 x Stainless Steel Poles NOTE:If the broom handle will not stay together, please contact us, we will provide the solution for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great light weight dust broom; well made. Unfortunately a witch flew off on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and sturdy and perfectly balanced
reviews.reviewText: It’s an excellent broom. Well constructed and perfectly balanced. The bristles are soft and bendable. Combined with an angle tip, the broom reaches into the tightest of corners for a perfect sweep of debris. I highly recommend it. I’m so very pleased. It is exactly what i wanted for an indoor broom. Thank you all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great buy, great broom
reviews.reviewText: This product works wonderfully on hardwood floors, better than a dust mop because you can sweep dirt into a dustpan, and better than a hard broom which could mar the floors. I gave it 4 starts because it is a little bit flimsy; doesn't bother me, but might bother some. Easy to put together. Great buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The brisels are not stiff, so gentle cleaning jobs works great, not made for tuff jobs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars With this broom I don’t mind sweeping
reviews.reviewText: This broom is so comfortable! The angle and the softness of the bristles do a great job. It is light so it doesn’t require much effort like other brooms. Good purchase!

reviews.reviewText: Sweep up the crumbs, leaves on the deck, a sweet broom

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars World’s best broom
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for a soft bristle broom for several yrs. At one time a certain discount store sold them for low price but stopped. I have searched sites for “ best brooms “ but none were good for me. A good broom needs soft bristles, be light weight, slanted brush. For older people or those with back problems, stiff bristles are hard to maneuver, and can leave a trail of pieces behind you.This was affordable , nice color, ……fits the bill perfectly
